name: @eximchain/api-types
description: Shared types used across Eximchain APIs

scripts.build:
tsc && typedoc && touch docs/build/.nojekyll && echo "include:
  - "_*_.html"
  - "_*_.*.html"" >> docs/build/config.yml
scripts.deployDocs: npm run build; npx gh-pages -d docs/build -t

author: John O'Sullivan <john@eximchain.com>
